TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessPingCallback

Docs.summary: Provides functionality to respond to a ping request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IProcessPingCallback is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Respond() cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides a callback routine that responds to a ping request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Respond is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
